theme: Absurd Events, Rules, and Regulations Around the World

questions.question: A noun meaning the point or level at which something begins or changes; the limit or brink of a situation.
A verb meaning to prevent someone from doing something; to hinder or obstruct an action.
An adjective describing behaviour or style that is exaggerated, dramatic, or showy.
An adjective meaning economical or careful with money; not wasteful.
A verb meaning to break a rule or law; to violate or infringe upon something.
An adjective meaning very worn-out, thin, or shabbyâ€”literally or metaphorically.
A noun referring to strong or violent feelings experienced during a difficult situation; turmoil or struggle.
A noun meaning a dense group of bushes or trees, or metaphorically, a confusing set of rules.
An adjective describing something dangerous in a hidden or unpredictable way.
An adjective meaning very loud or powerful; booming or resounding.
